mapper.insert: insert into c_car (ID, DISCOUNTS, DEALER_QUOTATION, GUIDE_PRICE, DISPALCEMENT, OIL_WEAR, IMG_URL, LEVER, SECOND_HAND_PICE, INVENTORY, CAR_BRAND, CAR_TYPE, CART_ID, HOT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discounts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerQuotation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guidePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispalcement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilWear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lever,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondHandPice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hot,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update c_car set DISCOUNTS = #{discounts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_QUOTATION = #{dealerQuotation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUIDE_PRICE = #{guidePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPALCEMENT = #{dispalcement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OIL_WEAR = #{oilWear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_URL = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVER = #{lever,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECOND_HAND_PICE = #{secondHandPice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVENTORY = #{inventory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_BRAND = #{carBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_TYPE = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CART_ID = #{cartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOT = #{hot,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, DISCOUNTS, DEALER_QUOTATION, GUIDE_PRICE, DISPALCEMENT, OIL_WEAR, IMG_URL, LEVER, SECOND_HAND_PICE, INVENTORY, CAR_BRAND, CAR_TYPE, CART_ID, HOT from c_car where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, DISCOUNTS, DEALER_QUOTATION, GUIDE_PRICE, DISPALCEMENT, OIL_WEAR, IMG_URL, LEVER, SECOND_HAND_PICE, INVENTORY, CAR_BRAND, CAR_TYPE, CART_ID, HOT from c_car
